text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
Hey! Why are you two standing 
there looking so serious?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I just happened to bump into Ruby on 
that corner earlier and we started talking.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
But then, a running student accidentally 
crashed into us and we all tumbled down. 
……Ruby, are you hurt anywhere?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Not to worry. I appreciate your concern, 
but I was not harmed.

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Heeeh, you two are in luck, then! Since you're here with magical girl Sweepy!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
Twinkle twinkle☆ 
Pain, pain, go away～～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……What might be the purpose of this?

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
Isn't it obvious?♪ I cast a spell to make 
the pain go away. See, it doesn't hurt 
anymore, does it!?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, you're right. 
Thanks for the amazing magic, Sweep.

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. If you're ever in trouble, 
I'll be glad to cast it again♪
